en.title: FusionExcel Donates RP 53,800,000 (RM 17,000) to Rotary International Indonesia's "Gift Of Life" 02nd May 2009.
en.content: At FE's Achiever's Recognition Dinner held recently at Hotel Millennium Jakarta, on 02nd May 2009, FE was proud to donate RP 53,800,000 (RM 17,000) to Rotary International Indonesia's "Gift Of Life" Project. The donation is to pay for a heart operation for a child to enable it to live a normal life. Rotary International Indonesia was represented by it's former District Governor Natalie Soebagjo. Witnessing the donation was heart surgeon Dr Jusuf Rachmat from Hospital Dr Cipto Mangunkusuma who will be performing the operation on the child. Dr Jusuf is one of a small handful of heart surgeons who specializes in heart surgery for young children and babies.
